text: Maybe one day i will be an editor. this is why i choose this class. unfortunately, i wasn't able to get an appartment in a city far away from my home to do the exact studies i was thinking at first, because it was too expansive for my mom. I would love to study something around books, so i've made the choice to go to information-communication. After three years, i really hope i'll be able to do the master "Métiers du livre et de l'édition". I've made this choice beacause i am a fan of books, i've already read twenty-six books this year and nearly forty last year. Books are helping me when time's hard, with them i can think of something else, and go to a complitely different world. One day, i've read on Internet that thanks to books, you can live hundreads of life during one lifetime. And i can't think of a better description of what read books feels like. I would love to work as an editor because this job is interresting on many points : you can read a tons of manuscripts, be able to "choose"  the cover of the book, you can see people's reactions when they get the books in their hands... I remember when i was little, my mom told me about the job of an editor and it scares me at first. At that time, books weren't such a big part of my life and thinking of working around them during all of my life was out of mind. But then, i grew up and my real passion for books really started. Now, i am working as harder as i can to get my dream job, that i know will be fantastic.
